About.quote: Be the change you want to see in the world
About.title: Welcome to my portfolio, I am
About.p1: Detail-oriented Fullstack Developer with 4+ years of experience in web technologies with a effective and creative approach for every project. Since 2019, I have been developing and contributing to open-source applications, websites and games.
About.p2: Proficient in Front-end frameworks and libraries such as React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind. I also have experience with Back-end technologies such as Node.js, Express.js, and both relational and non-relational databases.

Projects.title: My Projects
Projects.Chronotune: Chronotune is a fun and addicting web game where you have to guess the release date of random songs from Spotify's database
Projects.EmojiGuesser: EmojiGuesser is a simple cool game where you are tasked with guessing the name of an emoji or which emoji represents a certain word.
Projects.HexGuesser: HexGuesser is a simple and silly fun game where you are tasked with guessing the hex code of endlessly generated random colors.
Projects.DYOM Bingo: DYOM Bingo is a bingo game made for DYOM, a mod for GTA San Andreas.
Projects.nIRC: A very simple public chat-room website.
Projects.Blog: This is my personal blog where I write about my projects, hobbies and other stuff I find interesting.
Projects.Scriptorium: Scriptorium is a Windows desktop application that lets you create tests and quizzes for anything you want.
Projects.PopPidgeon: PopPidgeon is a simple platform game that you goal is to pop all the bubbles on the screen, while avoiding colliding with it.
Projects.Cool Space Shooter: That's my first game ever. It's a simple space shooter game. Use the mouse to move the ship, click to shoot and use spacebar to restart the game after game over screen.
